website_summaries.verdict: Featuring a wide variety of Pokémon from Sword & Shield, and plenty of impressive cards, this booster box makes it easy to construct custom decks.
pros: Includes 36 booster packs with 10 cards each, for a total of 360 cards
Unwrap strong Pokémon cards like Sandaconda V, Rillaboom V, and Copperajah V
cons: With just over 190 cards in this set, you should expect some duplicates

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely disgusting!!!
customer_reviews.text: I would give this a 0 star review if possible! I’m absolutely disgusted. I purchased this booster box for my daughters 6th birthday bc she absolutely loves opening packs together. We had her birthday party today and just opened the “booster box” to find that every pack had been opened and every card was replaced with generic trainer cards. My little girl is now heartbroken and I can’t even return the product bc everything is already opened and it would look like I am the one that opened the packs
customer_reviews.author: Dallas

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Pull!
customer_reviews.text: Pre-ordered and got it before the said delivery date. Got an amazing pull with several V and VMax cards. Will def. be purchasing again!
customer_reviews.author: Mario

customer_reviews.title: TAMPERING IN BOXES
customer_reviews.text: I received a Tampered Booster box. The plastic wrapping on the box was super loose and the box was ripped. I had never opened up a booster box ever in my life so i didn’t know it had signs of tampering. But it was brought to my attention when i uploaded a video of me unboxing it on youtube and a viewer pointed it out to me. i know i am not the first to have this problem with this specific seller.
customer_reviews.author: David Zuniga

customer_reviews.title: Decent pull rate
customer_reviews.text: 4 ultra rare, 2 full-art ultra rare, 1 full-art trainer, 1 secret rare, 1 rainbow rare....not too shabby!
customer_reviews.author: Danielle Smith

customer_reviews.title: It's legit. Go ahead and buy it.
customer_reviews.text: Bought the booster box, opened it, and (you can't make these things up) the first pack I opened had the Secret Rare gold card. The box had plenty of good stuff in it (see picture). Have fun!
customer_reviews.author: King Zakyu

customer_reviews.title: Great box
customer_reviews.text: First booster box of rebel clash bought and it was great got 1 hyper rare 2 full arts 4 vs and 2 vmaxs.
customer_reviews.author: C.Sowards

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy
customer_reviews.text: So, I’m highly highly disappointed, you can tell the product had been weighed and opened then resealed with like super glue cause it was chipping off.
customer_reviews.author: wes

customer_reviews.title: Good cards and packs.
customer_reviews.text: My friend and I split the bill on this and we opened packs together. Each of us got atleast 3 full art cards (V, Vmax, trainers, items, etc). My friend even got a golden item card. I got a V intelleon, Vmax intelleon, V Ninetales, V Boltund, VMax Rainbow Rillaboom, and a bunch of holos/reverse holos. The only reason I am giving it 4/5 is because the box itself was pretty beaten up (I assume during shipping) and came in a large white plastic envelope. Whenever I would touch the plastic wrap on the box I would get white powdery stuff on my hands.
customer_reviews.author: Scott Noetzli

customer_reviews.title: Resealed packs, Pokemon center is your best bet
customer_reviews.text: Resealed cards... I opened the cards and was recieving a few holo pulls and thought everything was normal. Some cards were okay, but the packaging on it looks s tampered with, holes where the crimps were, glue strings on top of cards, and cards seemed to resealed or cut short. I recieved this as a gift and am sad to see $100 go mostly to waste
customer_reviews.author: William

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic
customer_reviews.text: The kids had a great time opening these! They didn’t appear to be pre-weighed because we received a rainbow rare, plenty of foils, and a bunch of other great cards!
customer_reviews.author: Kayla

customer_reviews.title: Caution: Great pull alert
customer_reviews.text: I pulled 14 total valuable cards: 6 holographic; 4 v; 1 full art v; 2 vmax; 1 rainbow rare vmax. Came in one day, non resealed packs, the box was a little dented but I don’t care
customer_reviews.author: sandra tan

customer_reviews.title: Great pulls
customer_reviews.text: Got 2 boxes. 1st box had 6 V's and 1 Vmax. Not bad 2nd box had 1 gold trainer card, 1 rainbow rare Vmax, 6 V's and 2 other Vmaxes. Needless to say my son won the booster box battle. But both had great pulls. 17 ultra rares or better in 72 packs. That's 24% of packs with ultra rares. Good stuff
customer_reviews.author: Dubcitymaniac

customer_reviews.title: Wow!
customer_reviews.text: Wow! Boltund V, Toxtricity V, Falinks V, Malmar V and VMAX, Copperajah V and VMAX, Dragapult V_VMAX and VMAX Secret Rare, Milotic V, Cinderace V, 2 Ninetails V, FullArt Oleana, FullArt Tool Scrapper Secret Rare, those are just the big ones, got a lot more foils and even more non foil rare. 2 box's.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: TAMPERED
customer_reviews.text: Each booster pack has 11 cards, 12 including the code card. Packaging is very suspect and obviously resealed. I would return but it’s too inconvenient with the quarantine. So I’ve wasted 100 dollars on false advertising!
customer_reviews.author: Patrick

customer_reviews.title: no tampering
customer_reviews.text: I was obviously hesitant when people were receiving open boxes or tampered packs that were resealed ... but I was delighted to find a brand new box, plastic was sealed. packs are all sealed! nothing was tampered with.
customer_reviews.author: Louis Candelaria

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: I contacted the seller cause of all these tampered boxes reviews and they guaranteed it would be factory sealed. I contacted them after it shipped. I have opened less than half the box and pulled 4 ultra rares so far. Easy five stars.
customer_reviews.author: chrisoud

customer_reviews.title: COMPLETELY TAMPERED
customer_reviews.text: All of the booster packs were opened and had an assortment of cards from different sets. Some packs had 9 cards, others had as many as 15. No holographics and no V's. A complete joke.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Purkis

customer_reviews.title: Good Buy
customer_reviews.text: Cards came in sealed and in perfect condition. Got two secret rare Frosmoth & Milo, five V, and one VMAX
customer_reviews.author: Eddy

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING SET!!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: This set is amazing and will become a classic! We have 7 amazing pulls. V and VMAX! Save money by buying booster boxes when you can!
customer_reviews.author: Matthew

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Pulls.
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic pulls, I easily got cards worth more than the price of the box. Some of these are definitely going to PSA.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Great pulls!
customer_reviews.text: Arrived on time and in excellent condition. Factory sealed as promised, nothing tampered with. 10/10 will buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Ellis

customer_reviews.title: Would buy from again
customer_reviews.text: Legit sealed Pokemon Rebel Clash Booster Box. Arrived on time and packaged great! Would buy from again! Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: Matthew J. Bruhn

customer_reviews.title: Revealed packs
customer_reviews.text: These packs where tampered with and resealed. Very bad product
customer_reviews.author: Lane Reed

customer_reviews.title: No holos, no Vs
customer_reviews.text: They must have done a better job hiding their work this time. I'm through 12 packs now and I haven't seen a single holo, rare, V, or anything. I like cards for the artwork, but they are still shipping out boxes that have been tampered with whether they think they've fixed their problem or not.
customer_reviews.author: Disappointed Buyer

customer_reviews.title: Incomplete
customer_reviews.text: Seems like the booster pack was tampered with. Only had 28 packs. The add said 36. A little disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: ksh612

customer_reviews.title: Great if looking for packs
customer_reviews.text: Great comes sealed, would not recommend for collecting the unopened box it did not come in the best condition a little crushed but overall great packs managed to pull a rainbow bosses orders and a secret rare, got at least 10/36 holo rare V/VMAX
customer_reviews.author: Spicy

customer_reviews.title: not bad but questionable
customer_reviews.text: first off the box came in a regular mail envelope and was damaged. a large majority of the cards were misprints. box had signs of tampering and there was a white powder on the wrapper. not a lot of the powder but definitely noticeable.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Carr

customer_reviews.title: amazing
customer_reviews.text: came sealed and got 1 full art milo, a boltund V, dragapult V, toxtricity V, dubwool V, 2 ninetales V's, copperajah Vmax, cinderace Vmax, and a Malamar Vmax Rainbow Rare. :)
customer_reviews.author: oscar

customer_reviews.title: Product manufacture sealed perfectly!
customer_reviews.text: Thank you very much! It was perfect gift for my son. The product was sealed with Pokemon printed seal and it was perfect condition.
customer_reviews.author: Lincoln

customer_reviews.title: Amazing purchase
customer_reviews.text: Got some great V cards best Purchase that I made 👍
customer_reviews.author: Claudia

customer_reviews.title: Woo tang
customer_reviews.text: My girls were very happy and we got 6 rares out of it woo tang clan
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Was a lil beat up but cards was fine
customer_reviews.text: Box came a little beat up but cards was just fine and got allpt of good card out of it
customer_reviews.author: david allen walker

customer_reviews.title: A++
customer_reviews.text: Came in as ordered with factory wrapping. I reordered the same day. A++
customer_reviews.author: Kyle Thompson

customer_reviews.title: Some good pulls
customer_reviews.text: Got a rainbow rare, a gold, 2 vmax, and 5 V cards.
customer_reviews.author: Dylan kneip

customer_reviews.title: Factory sealed and legitimate. Very happy
customer_reviews.text: First and foremost, the boostet box WAS still factory sealed with the pokemon logo cellophane. It was delivered on time. I wish it was delivered in a box instead of an envelope, because there was slight damage to the outside box packaging. But cards are fine. My daughter hasn't opened them yet, as this is going to be an Advent Calendar project I'm making for Christmas this year, but I am not suspicious that the box was tampered with. I'm confident in its authenticity.
customer_reviews.author: Judi Rohrer

customer_reviews.title: Opened packs
customer_reviews.text: I was only 10 yrs old back in 1998, Couldn't really afford pokemon cards back then but my sibblings and I helped out parents for money to buy cards. Fast forward I wanted the feeling of nostalgic pokemon opening packs. Unfortunately I noticed the outer seal was loose and ripped, As I continued to open the booster box I've noticed opened packs. I would reconsider buying pokemon boosters again here 1☆
customer_reviews.author: James Debois

customer_reviews.title: Box beat up, but cards still in good condition
customer_reviews.text: The package came in one day earlier than expected which was nice. My issue with it was that the package was kind of beat up but the packs were still in good condition. I check for signs of tampering before opening the box and each pack, I didn’t see anything. I managed to pull some pretty decent cards from this box. Will purchase again soon.
customer_reviews.author: Kahulali Reyes

customer_reviews.title: Box was damaged, cards were good.
customer_reviews.text: The box was a bit damaged but the booster packs inside were good. The packs seemed off but this seemed to be a manufacturer issue as I had some decent pulls.
customer_reviews.author: Diann Espinoza

customer_reviews.title: Extremely disappointing. Don't waste your money.
customer_reviews.text: We bought this package for my son and we immediately noticed that it was already opened, but we thought maybe there was some tear from shipping. The cards that came out were no where near what they were supposed to be. He opened one pack a day and none of them had any unique or rare cards. The packs were most likely swapped. Also, there were 35 packs and not 36. I attached a picture of all the packs that we received.
customer_reviews.author: Muhammad A.

customer_reviews.title: Pokemon center. Com
customer_reviews.text: Pokemon center .com trusted. The shrink wrap is pokemon marked!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Pokemon TCG: Sword & Shield Rebel Clash Booster Box
product_meta.description: Pokemon TCG: Sword & Shield Rebel Clash Booster Box
feature_bullets: GIVE YOUR COLLECTION A BOOST: Includes 36 Sword & Shield Rebel Clash booster packs containing 10 cards each to advance your collection to a new level.
YOUR BEST ODDS FOR RARE CARDS: This booster box is factory sealed to prevent packs from being weighed or mapped. No more fear of valuable insert cards being removed.
BECOME THE GREATEST TRAINER: Will you find Toxtricity V, Dubwool V, Boltund V, Sandaconda V, Copperaja VMAX, or Dragapult VMAX?
GOTTA CATCH THEM ALL: The Pokemon Sword & Shield Rebel Clash expansion brings over 190 brand new cards to collect. Will you find them all?
BRAND NEW CARDS: Sealed by Pokemon International

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars216 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
